```{python}
import pandas as pd
import numpy as np
import altair as alt

np.random.seed(42)
data = pd.DataFrame(np.random.rand(100), columns=['Random Numbers'])

def preview_data(df):
    print(df.head())
    print(df.describe())
    return (alt.Chart(df).mark_bar().encode(
      alt.X("Random Numbers:Q", bin = True),
      alt.Y("count(Random Numbers):Q")
    ))

preview_data(data)
```
